description.value:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

The flash and smoke from your frenzied gunfire conceals you from any enemies who might be left standing in the aftermath. You @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire]{Area Fire} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Auto-Fire]{Auto-Fire}. You leave behind a cloud of smoke and dust within the area that lasts until the end of your next turn or until dissipated by a strong wind (whichever happens first). Creatures in the area have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] condition, and all other creatures are concealed to them.
